markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Push it](/Feats.aspx?ID=3144) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 55 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Trick Driver](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=112)

**Prerequisites**
[Trick Driver Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3140); Master in [Driving Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8)

</column>

---

You can push your [vehicle's](Vehicles.aspx) performance beyond the limits envisioned by its makers. Whenever you succeed at a piloting check, the vehicle you are piloting gains a +5-foot circumstance bonus to all its Speeds until the end of your turn. If you critically succeed, this bonus increases to +10 feet.
name: Push it
prerequisite: Trick Driver Dedication; Master in Driving Lore

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 7" pfs="Standard" > Push it Source Guns & Gears pg. 55 2.0 Archetype Trick Driver Prerequisites Trick Driver Dedication; Master in Driving Lore --- You can push your vehicle's performance beyond the limits envisioned by its makers. Whenever you succeed at a piloting check, the vehicle you are piloting gains a +5-foot circumstance bonus to all its Speeds until the end of your turn. If you critically succeed, this bonus increases to +10 feet.
